entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
